headline: Otis Worldwide Corporation (OTIS) Has A Lot Of China Revenue, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About As He Said Everyone Won From Trump’s Japan Deal. Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE:OTIS) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE:OTIS) is a specialty industrial equipment company that deals with elevators, escalators, and associated products. Its shares have lost 3% year-to-date, […]
